mapper.select: select board_no as boardNo, board_title as boardTitle, board_content as boardContent, board_writer as boardWriter, readCount, regDate, priority, fileName, filePath, ncCount from (select rownum as rnum, b.* from (SELECT * FROM board order by 1 desc)b) board where (rnum between #{start} and #{end}) and priority=0

select board_no as boardNo, board_title as boardTitle, board_content as boardContent, board_writer as boardWriter, readCount, regDate, priority, fileName, filePath, ncCount from board where board_no=#{boardNo}
mapper.update: update board set readCount=readCount+1 where board_no=#{boardNo}
mapper.select: select board_no as boardNo, board_title as boardTitle, board_content as boardContent, board_writer as boardWriter, readCount, regDate, priority, fileName, filePath, ncCount from board where priority=1 order by 1 desc
select count(*)as cnt from board where priority=1

select * from (select rownum as rnum, b.* from (SELECT * FROM board
where BOARD_TITLE like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
where BOARD_CONTENT like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
where BOARD_WRITER like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
where (BOARD_TITLE like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or BOARD_CONTENT LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%')
order by 1 desc)b) where (rnum between #{start} and #{end})

select count(*) from board
where BOARD_TITLE like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
where BOARD_CONTENT like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
where BOARD_WRITER like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
where (BOARD_TITLE like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or BOARD_CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%')
